get-eth.title: Get testnet/buildnet tokens
get-eth.category-content-one: You need to own some testnet ETH to be able to pay for the transaction fees to bridge tokens from Sepolia Testnet to Massa Buildnet. You can get 0.5 ETH using this
get-eth.category-content-two: provided by Alchemy. You can find step-by-step instructions in

loading-box.subtitle: (It can take up to 2 minutes...)
loading-box.check: Check the balance in your Metamask wallet.
loading-box.add-tokens-message: You might need to manually add the token to your wallet.
loading-box.error: Something went wrong. Drop us a message at:

error.general: Something went wrong! Please, try again!
Something went wrong! Please, try again!

balance.error: We couldn't fetch your balance! Please, try again!

unexpected-error.title: OOps!
unexpected-error.link: Go back to the main page!
unexpected-error.no-wallet: No wallet is associated with your Massa Account. Please create one and try again!

connect-wallet.title: Connect wallets
connect-wallet.description: Connect your wallets to start bridging tokens. One EVM wallet and one Massa wallet are required.

connect-metamask.title: Metamask

station-connect-error.error-station: in order to connect your wallet.
